LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA.label: Medium Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA.description: HP : 300 Power : 450W A medium capacity Refinery, far from conventional industrial capabilities but reliable and versatile. It's 30% more efficient to produce directly a whole barrel than small quantity of chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryUpgradeA.label: Chemfuel Tank
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryUpgradeA.description: HP : 150 Power : 50W Speed : +5% Refinery Upgrade : 10 of these small tanks can be added to improve the speed of refining, making quickly available the heaviest organic elements.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryUpgradeB.label: Cracking Unit
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryUpgradeB.description: HP : 300 Power : 450W Speed : +30% Refinery Upgrade : Works in parallel with the refinery units to process the heaviest elements.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryUpgradeC.label: Hydrolyzer
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryUpgradeC.description: HP : 300 Power : 450W Speed : +60% Refinery Upgrade : The hydrolyzer significantly increases the transformation of organic matter.
